name: ClearRock Capital, LLC
overview:
ClearRock Capital LLC is an SEC-registered investment advisor.

The firm develops endowment-style portfolios for its client base of individuals, endowments, and corporate retirement plans. The firm has a global macro orientation and provides a high level of client service. The portfolios are broadly diversified across multiple asset class and control risks, taxes, and costs. ClearRock Capital maintains offices in Palo Alto, CA, Idaho, and Oregon.
